title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 62-5.0 - Introduction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 62-5.0 - Introduction

State Regulations
(a) The purpose of this Subpart is to implement the provisions of section
3415
of the Insurance Law which require the superintendent to establish a supplemental claim form for certain fire loss claims in excess of ten thousand dollars ($10,000) in cities with a population of one million or more persons. (b) The purpose of this amendment is to replace the Supplemental Fire Claim Form (NYFC-1) Part 3 with a revised form, to simplify the processing of the required information submitted by the insurance industry to the Bureau of Fire Investigation. The information added to the form is expected to enhance the investigatory research capabilities contemplated by section
3415
of the Insurance Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
§§
62-5.0

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
